description:
One of http://anidb.net/ch35306 [Hibiki]`s friends and transsexual owner of a beauty salon. His friendship with http://anidb.net/ch35306 [Hibiki] is good enough such that he is the one http://anidb.net/ch35306 [Hibiki] turns to when the latter decides to harbor http://anidb.net/ch35303 [Ishtar] after rescuing her on an assignment.
Source: wiki
name: Mash
